Html:
http://trxviewer.codeplex.com/

Just wondering...

Only immediate difference is that provides a web hosting/accessible platform for viewing the results. Beyond that, one has to try out the 2 tools to know how they compare to each other.

You can see some screenshots of trxviewer here:

http://trxviewer.codeplex.com/documentation

I like trx2html better because it can be integrated into a build process, and email results delivered as part of a build notification to all developers.
